news.title: AI-Driven Rally Pushes Tech Stocks To Records, Broadcom Enters Trillion-Dollar Club, Inflation Data Flashes Warning Signal: This Week In The Markets - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL ) , Amazon.com  ( NASDAQ:AMZN )

news.title: Tesla's Meteoric Rise: Why $1K a Share Isn't So Crazy
news.content: Investors can leverage several different methods to determine long-term price targets. Using these methods on Tesla, the stock is amid a historical breakout that can send shares to $1,000 or more.

news.title: Tesla's 76% Post-Trump Rally: Bullish Run Or Signal To Cash Out? - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Tesla's 76% post-Trump rally faces risks as technical indicators show bullish momentum but overbought conditions. Political tailwinds and autonomy advancements drive Tesla's surge, but caution advised during selling pressure signs. Tesla Inc.

news.title: What's Going On With Rivian  ( RIVN )  Stock? - Rivian Automotive  ( NASDAQ:RIVN )
news.content: Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN shares are trading higher by some 2.8% to $13.87 this week. Analyst Mickey Legg of Benchmark initiated coverage earlier this week with a Buy rating and an $18 price target.
